divs: Sighting Detailsi arrived home at about 10 35 pm as i walked into the house i went through the living room and then approached the kitchen,from the kitchen there is a den in which we have our samsung 50 inch screen and couches,there is a fabulous mountain view and city light view from the den as i looked at the window toward the mountaintop i noticed a very bright white light,i knew immediately it wasnt a helicopter or plane because it was staying still,i had my binoculars in my hands viewing this bright light (the size of the moon) i noticed after looking at it for about 30 seconds it began to open and get bigger and rounder,it was then i began to see red and orange lights flashing on and off. all of a sudden it began to move, bare in mind it was still all of the time i was viewing it. when it started to move it was heading directly in my direction. i had tried to take a picture of it with my cell phone while it was a bright light,the picture came out totally black,old cell phone. well here it comes hoovering over my driveway,when it was almost directly over me i heard a very loud humming sound from this ship. as it was directly over me(about 1000 to 2000 feet above) i observed red lights,orange lights,and white lights. the red and orange were flashing while the white were steady on.what really freaked me out was that all of the lights and the saucer were turning in a circular pattern,there were many lights so i was able to see the whole shape of the object and it was low enough also for me to see it,thats why i saw the roundish shape and all of the ship rotating circular style,it was at a speed i would say 10 to 20 miles per hr,but because it was up in the air it seemed to move slower,it continued pass me and stopped and hoovered about 3 to 5 miles from me,it finally went to the left where i could no longer see it. from the time i first viewed the ship to the time i could no longer see it,it traveled in a straight direct line,until it finally moved to the left of me where i could no longer see it. bare in mind this was a very huge ship i say this because when it was directly over me i had to move my binoculars to the side and foward to see the whole ship and size,.fortunately the many lights,and the fact of this ship being low i was able to get a clear visible look at it....especially with my binoculars....i will say this much. what i visibally saw at 10:35 pm on sept 19th was something that i strongly believe was not ours.....living in this mountainous area pitch black at that hour seems logical that this object was moving slow and observing......i believe i will never have the opportunity to see ever again a saucer,spaceship,mothership the whole event from the beginning to the end was approximately 15 to 20 minutes the object was over the mountain toward sunland or further and moved towards La Crescenta and further or what ever you desire to call it in my life time that close....this event that i witnessed was a phonominal time in my life and will never be forgotten by me
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 19th 2012
Summary: clearly saw a mothership rotating red orange and white lights,hovered over my driveway
